src

Project.h

Go to the documentation of this file.
00001 /**********************************************************************
00002 
00003   Audacity: A Digital Audio Editor
00004 
00005   Project.h
00006 
00007   Dominic Mazzoni
00008 
00009   In Audacity, the main window you work in is called a project.
00010   Projects can contain an arbitrary number of tracks of many
00011   different types, but if a project contains just one or two
00012   tracks then it can be saved in standard formats like WAV or AIFF.
00013   This window is the one that contains the menu bar (except on
00014   the Mac).
00015 
00016 **********************************************************************/
00017 
00018 #ifndef __AUDACITY_PROJECT__
